title: President Donald J. Trump Supports the Venezuelan People’s Efforts to Restore Democracy in Their Country – The White House
content:
Fact Sheets			

		Foreign Policy	

Issued on:
January 29, 2019
The people of Venezuela have courageously spoken out against Maduro and his regime and demanded freedom and the rule of law.
						President Donald J. Trump					RECOGNIZING THE LEGITIMATE GOVERNMENT OF VENEZUELA: The United States has officially recognized Juan Guaido as the Interim President of Venezuela.PRESSURING MADURO AND HIS CRONIES: The United States has imposed tough sanctions on Maduro and members of his previous regime. STANDING WITH THE VENEZUELAN PEOPLE: President Trump stands with the people of Venezuela as they demand democracy, human rights, and prosperity denied to them by Maduro.
